title: No Churn Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream
directions: Using a food processor, puree strawberries.
In a large mixing bowl or mixer, combine sugar, cream cheese, vanilla, half and half and strawberries. Blend until smooth.
Freeze 2+ hours. Serve with crushed graham crackers.
ingredients: 2 c fresh strawberries {can substitute 1 c frozen}
8 oz cream cheese, softened at room temperature
